org.gbif.crawler

Class AbstractCrawlListener<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ,RESP>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gbif.crawler.AbstractCrawlListener<CTX,REQ,RESP>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CrawlListener<CTX,REQ,RESP>

    public class AbstractCrawlListener<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ,RESP>
extends Object
implements CrawlListener<CTX,REQ,RESP>
    Simple abstract base listener so that you can only have to implement the methods you're interested in.
    See Also:
    CrawlListener

        Reports a response we received.
        Specified by:
        response in interface CrawlListener<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ,RESP>
        Parameters:
        response - we received
        retry - which retry is this
        duration - how long did it take to receive the response and process it
        recordCount - how many records does the response claim to contain
        endOfRecords - are there more pages coming
